title: Kenja no Deshi wo Nanoru Kenja
synopsis: Sakimori Kagami plays a VRMMORPG called Arch Earth Online. He is a veteran player with the name and appearance similar to an elderly bearded wizard from a certain book about a ring.
staff: [['Motonaga, Keitarou', ['Director']], ['Ebina, Yasunori', ['Sound Director']], ['Asaka', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Erabareshi', ['Theme Song Performance']]]
